name: Golf Solitaire HD
description:
Designed for tablets and phones Golf Solitaire HD is a clean implementation of one of the top solitaires!

Features:
- Easy level with two jokers per game,
- Classic level with normal Golf Solitaire,
- 2 decks variation! Even more fun than classic!
- Undo, saving state.

Rules:
- Click on cards to move them to foundation,
- You can move cards that are one point higher or lower than the card already on foundation (for example 9 on 8 or King on Queen),
- You can move King on Ace!
- You can move Jokers (easy mode) on any card.
- Move all cards to foundation to win!
